title: 5 Short Tips When You Become Backend Engineer
description: backend engineer hard? try my tips and tricks.
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:o}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(t){const a={a:"a",h3:"h3",p:"p",...t.components};return o(e,{children:[n(a.p,{children:"Right now I currently work as a backend developer in my company. Its really awsome if i can share my experience with you some tricks and tips I‚Äôve learned along the way when i become backend engineer in my company. Alert! These are based on my experiences as a backend engineer so lets dive into it üòÉ."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"1-read-api-documentation",children:n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#1-read-api-documentation",children:"1. Read API documentation"})}),"
",o(a.p,{children:["When youre come to some company you gonna end up with code that written by someone else, unstructural code, some weird comment on some code and also some problem or many problem :v. Don't worry This is all normal. but the things you have to do firstly  is",n("span",{style:{color:"red"},children:"not to fix that"}),", But to read the API documentation of your application. Learn by Reading the document of your company is knowing you flow of your company. So its the first tips you have to do when you become Backend Engineer in your company."]}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"2-testing-your-api-route",children:n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#2-testing-your-api-route",children:"2. Testing Your API ROUTE"})}),"
",o(a.p,{children:["Speaking of the backend, of course, you're going to end up working with APIs, let‚Äôs talk about ",n(a.a,{href:"https://www.postman.com/",children:"Postman"}),". Some of you already know it or mybe not, shortly postman It‚Äôs an software that helps you test, design, and build your APIs. Before any frontend engineer blames you for non-working APIs üò©,"]}),"
",n("div",{style:{display:"flex",justifyContent:"center"},children:n("img",{src:"/blog/backend_meme.png",width:"300px"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Do test everything in Postman first. You can get, send, and even update your data there. Postman is easy to use and lets you organize your routes in folders for easy access later and even you can share your postman file to json and send it to your teamate or even work together there."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"3-ngrok",children:n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#3-ngrok",children:"3. ngrok"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Once your code is done and tested, how do you share it with your frontend team? Should you set up your own testing domain? Should you buy it? Should you deploy it?"}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"the answer is NOPE ‚ùå"}),"
",o(a.p,{children:["That‚Äôs where ",n(a.a,{href:"https://ngrok.com/",children:"n g r o k"})," comes in. It‚Äôs a tool that makes your localhost accessible on the internet with a temporary public URL. This is very crucial for backend engineers working closely with frontend teams. Just remember, don‚Äôt use it for phishing‚Äîyou‚Äôll get banned ‚ö†Ô∏è."]}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"4-always-use-git",children:n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#4-always-use-git",children:"4. Always use git"})}),"
",o(a.p,{children:["Git, especially ",n(a.a,{href:"https://github.com/",children:"GitHub"}),", is a must-have for any programmer, not just backend developers. If you have Git it will tracks every change you make, making it easy to revert to previous versions with fast. dont said that you still ctrl+z every file in your vscode üóø.  In my company, GitHub is a lifesaver. If your latest production build fails, you don‚Äôt need to undo all your changes manually. Just revert to your last commit and start from there. So Git is essential when collaborating with other developers."]}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"5-use-ai-",children:n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#5-use-ai-",children:"5. Use AI ‚ú®"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Last Tips from me is Don‚Äôt be arrogant about not using AI. This era AI isn‚Äôt here to replace us asa programmer but to HELP us. Programmer not using AI is, frankly, silly. You have technology exists to help you as programmer and build better applications. Why youre not use it ? use it to assist you in your work."}),"
",n("div",{style:{display:"flex",justifyContent:"center"},children:n("img",{src:"/blog/backend_meme_2.png",width:"300px"})}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"conclusion",children:n(a.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#conclusion",children:"Conclusion"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Whether you agree with me or not, these are some recommendations based on my experience as a backend engineer. Hopefully, these tips help you on your journey. Happy Coding üöÄ."})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:o}=e.components||{};return o?n(o,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: I've been using Arc instead of Chrome for 3 months, and here's what I found:
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:t,jsxs:r}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(n){const i={a:"a",blockquote:"blockquote",h2:"h2",p:"p",...n.components};return r(e,{children:[t(i.p,{children:"Talking about browser, people immediately think of Google Chrome is'nt you? Yups It's the world's biggest player in internet surfing, with research it showing Chrome had a 72% market share in July 2023."}),"
",t("center",{children:t("img",{src:"/blog/arc_vs_chrome.png",width:"400px"})}),"
",t("center",{children:t("span",{style:{fontSize:"0.8em",marginTop:"-20px",fontWeight:"100",opacity:"0.6"},children:t(i.p,{children:t(i.a,{href:"https://www.statista.com/chart/30734/browser-market-share-by-region/",children:"https://www.statista.com/chart/30734/browser-market-share-by-region/"})})})}),"
",t(i.p,{children:"That's been true for me too. Ever since I started browsing the internet, I've tried lots of browsers like Safari, Mozilla, Opera, and Edge, but none of them could replace Chrome. Whether it's accessibility, a wide web view, tons of extensions, or developing programs, Chrome really rules the game."}),"
",t(i.p,{children:"But it's not about Chrome's greatness today's topic. The real topic is a browser that's been covering Chrome's flaws for me. After switching to Arc for the past 3 months, I've left Chrome behind completely. Chrome has gotten so big that it feels unbeatable, even by Microsoft. But I think that attitude could bring it down, just like Nokia back in the day."}),"
",t(i.p,{children:"The issue isn't about RAM, even though Chrome is a RAM hog. What I really want to highlight is Chrome's tab management. The way it handles tabs makes it tough to get stuff done. I admit it‚Äîonce I have a bunch of tabs open and they shrink to just little dots, it makes everything harder."}),"
",t("center",{children:t("img",{src:"/blog/arc_vs_chrome_2.png",width:"400px"})}),"
",t(i.p,{children:"Even though Chrome has features like tab grouping and the ability to open two windows at once, it still doesn‚Äôt solve the problem for me."}),"
",t(i.h2,{id:"thats-where-arc-comes-in",children:t(i.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#thats-where-arc-comes-in",children:"That's where Arc comes in"})}),"
",t("a",{href:"https://arc.net/",children:t("img",{src:"/blog/arc_vs_chrome_3.png",width:"800px"})}),"
",r(i.blockquote,{children:["
",t(i.p,{children:"a new browser that, for me, really answers issue about tons of tab"}),"
"]}),"
",r(i.p,{children:[t(i.a,{href:"https://arc.net/",children:"Arc"})," is amazing, in my opinion. Split-screen? ‚úÖ check. Bookmarks? ‚úÖ check. Tons of tabs? ‚úÖcheck. It's all wrapped up in Workspaces, which are my favorite feature and the solution I was looking for in Chrome. You can switch between different Workspaces while keeping one running. Plus, the customizable emojis and color Workspaces are super cool and aesthetic‚ÄîI'm totally in love with Arc."]}),"
",t(i.p,{children:"Another awesome thing about Arc is that the new tab opens as a popup. You can just preview it and then close it if you want‚Äîsuper convenient!"}),"
",t(i.p,{children:"For me, Arc is the future of browsing‚Äîamazing and beautiful. This is an honest review, not a promo from Arc. No matter how many Workspaces you have, when you close and reopen Arc, it keeps your tab history without needing to use Ctrl+Shift+Tab like in Chrome üòÜ"}),"
",r("center",{children:[t("img",{src:"/blog/arc_vs_chrome.gif",width:"500px"}),t("span",{style:{fontSize:"0.8em",marginTop:"-20px",opacity:"0.6"},children:t(i.p,{children:"My Arc Preview"})})]}),"
",t(i.p,{children:"But no great tool is without its flaws. On Windows, Arc still has some stability issues, and the sidebar can be a bit annoying, though you can just close it if needed. Still, these issues don‚Äôt really interfere with my productivity, even with thousands of tabs open."}),"
",t(i.p,{children:"Here are some shortcuts I use daily in Arc:"}),"
",r("table",{style:{margin:"0 auto",textAlign:"center"},children:[t("thead",{children:r("tr",{children:[t("th",{children:"shortcuts"}),t("th",{children:"Description"})]})}),r("tbody",{children:[r("tr",{children:[t("td",{children:"ctrl+T"}),t("td",{children:"Open a new tab"})]}),r("tr",{children:[t("td",{children:"ctrl+S"}),t("td",{children:"Close the sidebar if you don't like it"})]}),r("tr",{children:[t("td",{children:"ctrl+L"}),t("td",{children:"Change URL"})]}),r("tr",{children:[t("td",{children:"ctrl+D"}),t("td",{children:"Bookmark"})]}),r("tr",{children:[t("td",{children:"ctrl+W"}),t("td",{children:"Close the current tab or window"})]}),r("tr",{children:[t("td",{children:"ctrl+shift+C"}),t("td",{children:"Copy URL"})]}),r("tr",{children:[t("td",{children:"Alt+1, Alt+2, Alt+3, etc."}),t("td",{children:"Switch between Workspaces"})]}),r("tr",{children:[t("td",{children:"Ctrl+Tab"}),t("td",{children:"Switch between tabs"})]})]})]}),"
",r(i.p,{children:["There are many more, but these are the ones I use the most. You can check out more here: ",t(i.a,{href:"https://resources.arc.net/hc/en-us/articles/20595231349911-Keyboard-Shortcuts",children:"Arc Keyboard Shortcuts"})]}),"
",t(i.p,{children:"That's it for my thoughts on Arc. See you in the next article!"})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:r}=e.components||{};return r?t(r,{...e,children:t(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: Solo Capstone Mobile Developer on Bangkit 2024
description: my story while joining bangkit academy 2024
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:a,jsxs:n}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(t){const i={a:"a",h3:"h3",p:"p",...t.components};return n(e,{children:[a("img",{src:"/blog/bangkit_logo.png"}),"
",n(i.p,{children:["The story begins when I joined the ",a(i.a,{href:"https://grow.google/intl/id_id/bangkit/",children:"Bangkit Academy program led by Google, Tokopedia, Gojek, and Traveloka"})," which ran from early February 2024 to June 2024. Initially, I was hesitant about taking the mobile developer class because it focused on Android, which I thought was complicated and challenging üì±."]}),"
",a(i.p,{children:"But to my surprise, Bangkit changed my perspective, and I started to enjoy Android development. I even took a solo approach for my capstone project. Capstone is the final project in Bangkit, where you need to create a startup product with a team as a graduation requirement. Yep, a team. But I ended up doing it alone."}),"
",a(i.p,{children:"The unexpected part is that I managed to complete my app four days ahead of schedule, which is today. My capstone project is an app called Fungi.info."}),"
",a(i.h3,{id:"background",children:a(i.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#background",children:"Background"})}),"
",a(i.p,{children:"Initially, I didn't have a team for the capstone project ü•≤. Eventually, I teamed up with my campus friends Ocha and Gladwin, and a team from Brawijaya University. We decided to create an app for detecting mushrooms, which would be useful for travelers and explorers, or us as students when we're in the wild."}),"
",a(i.h3,{id:"main-features",children:a(i.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#main-features",children:"Main Features"})}),"
",a(i.p,{children:"The main feature of this app is image classification using TensorFlow Lite, developed by our amazing ML team. It can detect different types of mushrooms, and the accuracy and articles displayed make the app quite engaging."}),"
",n("figure",{children:[a("img",{src:"/blog/screenshoot_android.png",alt:"Android_studio"}),a("figcaption",{children:"Screenshoot of my application"})]}),"
",a(i.h3,{id:"database",children:a(i.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#database",children:"Database"})}),"
",a(i.p,{children:"The app uses Firebase for its database because our cloud computing team was MIA until the last week. There was a lot of drama, but as a mobile developer, I had to step in and back things up. We also used Room Database to store entries for explorers who want to save mushroom data."}),"
",a(i.h3,{id:"other-features",children:a(i.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#other-features",children:"Other Features"})}),"
",a(i.p,{children:"There are other features like changing profile pictures, cropping images, changing passwords, resetting passwords via email, and changing usernames. These may not be essential, but they add to the app's appeal."}),"
",a(i.h3,{id:"release",children:a(i.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#release",children:"Release"})}),"
",n(i.p,{children:["Finally, as of today, the app is ready to be tested just like any other app out there. If you want to try it out, you can go to our ",a(i.a,{href:"https://github.com/Fungi-info-Bangkit-Capstone/android/releases/tag/Fungi.infov1.0",children:"GitHub"})," and download try the app."]}),"
",n(i.p,{children:["If you wanna see our full Github Repo go checkit out ",a(i.a,{href:"https://github.com/Fungi-info-Bangkit-Capstone",children:"here"})]}),"
",a(i.p,{children:"That's the story of my solo capstone project. Bangkit has been a memorable experience for me, bringing new friends and challenging me to reach this far. Once again, thank you, Bangkit!"}),"
",a("a",{href:"https://github.com/Fungi-info-Bangkit-Capstone/android",children:a("img",{src:"/blog/bangkit.png"})})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:n}=e.components||{};return n?a(n,{...e,children:a(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: This website change To Remix
body:
const{Fragment:n,jsx:e,jsxs:l}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(a){const r={a:"a",code:"code",em:"em",figure:"figure",li:"li",p:"p",pre:"pre",span:"span",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...a.components};return l(n,{children:[l(r.p,{children:["Setelah akhirnya menghilang dari lane website akhirnya aku kembali lagi, mengurus urusan perkuliahan pada semester akhir and now I'm Back! üöÄ look what i have right know I'm exploring some new other framework: ",e(r.strong,{children:"REMIX."})]}),"
",e("img",{src:"/blog/change_to_remix.jpg"}),"
",e("h2",{children:"Background"}),"
",l(r.p,{children:["Semua bermula dari sidang akhir skripsi saya menggunakan nextjs (*cek skripsiku ",e(r.a,{href:"https://doi.org/10.31154/cogito.v10i2.764.447-459",children:"disini"}),") dimana dosen penguji saya menanyakan hal hal yang saya sulit untuk menjawab üò§.salah satu masukan yang beliau berikan adalah untuk saya mempelajari remix dari pada nextjs yang tidak stabil dari situlah saya belajar dan woaww saya sangat menyukainya ‚ù§Ô∏è"]}),"
",e("h2",{children:"Remix"}),"
",l(r.p,{children:["Buat kamu yang tidak tau remix, remix adalah framework react saingannya nextjs mereka punya slogan keren yaitu ",e(r.em,{children:'"Focused on web standards and modern web app UX, you‚Äôre simply going to build better websites"'})," Better website dan web standards, remix menurutku keren banget dan bisa dibilang akan aku gunakan terus untuk beberapa projek kedepan üåü"]}),"
",e(r.p,{children:"Remix simple, tidak ada folder folder, dan menurutku cukup praktis dan elegan, pemanggilan api juga enak dan berbagai macam, untuk itulah projek pertamaku yaitu merevamp ini kepada Remix"}),"
",e("h2",{children:"Nextjs vs Remix"}),"
",e(r.p,{children:"Bukan berarti aku senang ketika aku pindah framework aku memerlukan waktu berminggu-minggu untuk menentukan apakah aku perlu mempelajari remix daripada Nextjs yang sudah aku mulai kuasai di tahun lalu bahkan penelitianku menggunakan next yang sangat luat biasa"}),"
",e(r.p,{children:"namun satu hal yang aku mulai benci dari nextjs adalah ketidakstabilannya yang skrng sudah makin terlihat ketika aku melihat nextjs 15 rilis itulah sebabnya aku merasa tidak stabil nextjs lama lama krn berbagai fitur yang mulai berbeda beda dan aneh, dibandingkan remix yang sampai sekarang masi saja versi 2.15"}),"
",e(r.p,{children:"namun inilah beberapa Benefit Remix yang tidak dimiliki nextjs"}),"
",l(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:"Kecepatan Gila banget, bahkan pada internet yang lemah"}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Formulir yang elegan"}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Tidak memerlukan JS sisi klien"}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Mengadopsi API Standar WEB"}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Rute Berserang"}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Meta Framework dengan React Router"}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.p,{children:"Kelemahan pada remix adalah di"}),"
",l(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:"Komunitasnya"}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Optimasi Gambar"}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Generasi Situs Statis"}),"
"]}),"
",l(r.p,{children:["untuk detail perbandingan lebih lanjut bisa kamu lihat blog dari ",e(r.a,{href:"https://remix.run/blog/remix-vs-next",children:"Ryan Florence"}),"
kesimpulannya jelas bahwa Remix lebih cepat dibandingkan Next js dan itu terbukti dari beberapa video capture yang dibuatnya"]}),"
",e(r.p,{children:"Salah satu hal menarik tentang Remix adalah kita tidak perlu membuat berbagai file untuk API; kita bisa memanggilnya dalam file yang sama. Berikut adalah contoh implementasinya:"}),"
",e(r.p,{children:e(r.em,{children:"route\note.tsx"})}),"
",e(r.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:e(r.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"tsx","data-theme":"github-dark",children:l(r.code,{"data-language":"tsx","data-theme":"github-dark",style:{display:"grid"},children:[l(r.span,{"data-line":"",children:[e(r.span,{style:{color:"#F97583"},children:"export"}),e(r.span,{style:{color:"#F97583"},children:" const"}),e(r.span,{style:{color:"#B392F0"},children:" meta"}),e(r.span,{style:{color:"#F97583"},children:":"}),e(r.span,{style:{color:"#B392F0"},children:" MetaFunction"}),e(r.span,{style:{color:"#F97583"},children:" ="}),e(r.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:" () "}),e(r.span,{style:{color:"#F97583"},children:"=>"}),e(r.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:" {"})]}),"
",l(r.span,{"data-line":"",children:[e(r.span,{style:{color:"#F97583"},children:"  return"}),e(r.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:" ["})]}),"
",l(r.span,{"data-line":"",children:[e(r.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"    { title: "}),e(r.span,{style:{color:"#9ECBFF"},children:'"Notes"'}),e(r.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:" },"})]}),"
",l(r.span,{"data-line":"",children:[e(r.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:"    { name: "}),e(r.span,{style:{color:"#9ECBFF"},children:'"description"'}),e(r.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:", content: "}),e(r.span,{style:{color:"#9ECBFF"},children:'"This is a notes!"'}),e(r.span,{style:{color:"#E1E4E8"},children:" },"})]}),"

title: Kenapa Belajar React
body:
const{Fragment:a,jsx:n,jsxs:e}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(i){const t={a:"a",em:"em",h3:"h3",li:"li",p:"p",ul:"ul",...i.components};return e(a,{children:[e(t.p,{children:["Sebenarnya gaada alasan untuk tidak belajar ",n(t.a,{href:"https://react.dev/",children:"React"})," buat kamu yang suka dalam bidang programming. itu ",n(t.em,{children:"WAJIB"})," - kata gue mah, React itu sendiri adalah library yang dibuat dengan bahasa ",n(t.a,{href:"https://www.javascript.com/",children:"Javascript"})," bisa diilang
itu op banget apalagi kalau sudah tau javascript seperti apa‚ùó Dengan kamu belajar react saja kamu udh bisa buat building website frontend, backend, atau bahkan sampai mobile application. kurang apa lagi coba üòì. selain itu..."]}),"
",e(t.ul,{children:["
",e(t.li,{children:["Komunitasnya Luas banget (*krn yang buat ",n(t.a,{href:"https://github.com/facebook/react",children:"facebook"}),")"]}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"React mudah dipelajari & dipahami (*yang penting lu pahamjavascript )"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"üíµ Gajinya tinggi cuy"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Trending di Jaman skrng"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Librarynya banyak sepeprti Redux, React Router, Axios, Styled Component, dll"}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.h3,{id:"harus-apa-dulu-",children:n(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#harus-apa-dulu-",children:"Harus apa dulu ?"})}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"tapi tidak semudah itu ferguso... ada hal yang mestinya lu paham dulu sebelumnya yaitu HTML, CSS, javascript karena mostly itu yang penting sebagai dasar lu sebelum memulai pemograman baik dalam website atau aplikasi."}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"kalau udh paham mah gaskeunn..."}),"
",n(t.h3,{id:"belajar-dimana-nih-",children:n(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#belajar-dimana-nih-",children:"Belajar dimana nih ?"})}),"
",n("img",{src:"/blog/udemy_peter.jpg"}),"
",e(t.p,{children:["sebenarnya mah youtube itu sok aja bisa jago tapi kalau gue dulu
karena ingin gelar sertifikat (*anjay sertifikat) gue ambil dih ",n(t.a,{href:"http://udemy.com",children:"Udemy"})]})]})}return{default:function(a={}){const{wrapper:e}=a.components||{};return e?n(e,{...a,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...a})}):_createMdxContent(a)}};

title: Make Wedding Invitation Online
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(t){const r={a:"a",br:"br",code:"code",figure:"figure",h2:"h2",hr:"hr",img:"img",li:"li",ol:"ol",p:"p",pre:"pre",span:"span",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...t.components};return i(e,{children:[i(r.p,{children:["Creating a wedding invitation has never been easier üò´! Today, I am excited to share my latest project: a ",n(r.strong,{children:"free and customizable online wedding invitation template"})," built with modern web technologies."]}),"
",n(r.h2,{id:"q1-why-build-a-wedding-invitation",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#q1-why-build-a-wedding-invitation",children:"Q1: Why Build a Wedding Invitation?"})}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"Planning a wedding is a memorable journey, but it often comes with a long to-do list. Designing and distributing invitations can be costly and time-consuming. To help couples focus on what truly matters, I created a tool that makes it simple to build and share beautiful wedding invitations online."}),"
",n(r.h2,{id:"q2-what-is-the-features",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#q2-what-is-the-features",children:"Q2: What is the Features"})}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"Here are some highlights of the project:"}),"
",i(r.ul,{children:["
",i(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Built with Next.js and TypeScript"}),": Leveraging the power of modern frameworks for fast, reliable performance."]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"TailwindCSS"}),": Ensures the design is elegant and responsive."]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Dynamic Configuration"}),": Personalize every detail, including names, dates, events, and photos, via environment variables."]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Interactive Elements"}),": Features like countdown timers, embedded YouTube videos, and personalized guest greetings make your invitation engaging."]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Completely Free"}),": Fork the repository, customize it, and deploy it on your preferred platform."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(r.h2,{id:"q3-how-it-works",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#q3-how-it-works",children:"Q3: How It Works"})}),"
",i(r.ol,{children:["
",i(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Clone the Repository"}),n(r.br,{}),"
","First, grab the code from my GitHub repository:"]}),"
"]}),"
",n(r.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:n(r.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"bash","data-theme":"github-dark",children:i(r.code,{"data-language":"bash","data-theme":"github-dark",style:{display:"grid"},children:[i(r.span,{"data-line":"",children:[n(r.span,{style:{color:"#B392F0"},children:"git"}),n(r.span,{style:{color:"#9ECBFF"},children:" clone"}),n(r.span,{style:{color:"#9ECBFF"},children:" https://github.com/petershaan12/wedding-invitation.git"})]}),"
",i(r.span,{"data-line":"",children:[n(r.span,{style:{color:"#79B8FF"},children:"cd"}),n(r.span,{style:{color:"#9ECBFF"},children:" wedding-invitation"})]})]})})}),"
",i(r.ol,{start:"2",children:["
",i(r.li,{children:["
",i(r.p,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Customize the Details"}),n(r.br,{}),"
","Update the ",n(r.code,{children:".env.local"})," file with your wedding details, including:"]}),"
",i(r.ul,{children:["
",n(r.li,{children:"Couple names"}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Wedding date"}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Event locations and Google Maps links"}),"
",n(r.li,{children:"Music and photos"}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:["
",i(r.p,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Deploy the Invitation"}),n(r.br,{}),"
","Once personalized, deploy your project using platforms like Vercel or Netlify for free hosting."]}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",n(r.h2,{id:"preview",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#preview",children:"Preview"})}),"
",i(r.p,{children:["You can view a live demo of the wedding invitation template ",n(r.a,{href:"https://weddingly-free.vercel.app/",children:"here"}),".
",n(r.img,{src:"/blog/make_wedding_invitation.png",alt:"Wedding Invitation Preview"})]}),"
",n(r.h2,{id:"why-open-source",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#why-open-source",children:"Why Open Source?"})}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"I believe in sharing tools that can make life simpler and more joyful. By making this project open source, I hope to help couples and developers alike create something meaningful."}),"
",n(r.h2,{id:"closing-thoughts",children:n(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#closing-thoughts",children:"Closing Thoughts"})}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"Whether you're planning a wedding or looking for a fun project to learn Next.js and TailwindCSS, this template is for you. Feel free to fork the repository, share your feedback, or even contribute enhancements."}),"
",i(r.p,{children:["Check it out on GitHub: ",n(r.a,{href:"https://github.com/petershaan12/Weddingly-Free",children:"https://github.com/petershaan12/Weddingly-Free"})]}),"
",n(r.hr,{})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:i}=e.components||{};return i?n(i,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

website versi 2.0 yang jauh agak berbeda dari sebelumnya namun tenang saja kalau ingin cek perkembangannya bisa tetap diakses di sini yaitu: ",n(t.a,{href:"https://petershaanv1.vercel.app/",children:n(t.strong,{children:"versi 1"})})]}),"
",n(t.h2,{id:"fitur-update-yang-ada",children:n(t.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#fitur-update-yang-ada",children:"Fitur Update yang ada"})}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"ada banyak fitur update yang ada di website terbaru ini diantaranya adalah"}),"

"]})]})}return{default:function(a={}){const{wrapper:e}=a.components||{};return e?n(e,{...a,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...a})}):_createMdxContent(a)}};
